name: Bengaluru Cafe
description: Loved this place! We tried the butter masala dosa, tea, coffee, Idli, & Vada. The chutney they serve with the above is also so good if tasted solely! We in-fact had the butter masala dosa twice, felt ...
address: 9th Main Rd, 2nd Block, Jaya Nagar East, Jayanagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560011, India
opening_hours: ["Monday: 7:00 AM-9:30 PM", "Tuesday: 7:00 AM-9:30 PM", "Wednesday: 7:00 AM-9:30 PM", "Thursday: 7:00 AM-9:30 PM", "Friday: 7:00 AM-9:30 PM", "Saturday: 7:00 AM-9:30 PM", "Sunday: 7:00 AM-1:00 PM, 3:30-9:30 PM"]

We tried the butter masala dosa, tea, coffee, Idli, & Vada. The chutney they serve with the above is also so good if tasted solely! We in-fact had the butter masala dosa twice, felt like we could just have more & more. So crispy, buttery and actually tasty.
Very simple, minimal menu, a crowded place , yet the service is super fast! Very good management!! We hope to visit again.

Please never change! Just keep up with the simplicity, the less goes a long way🤍🙌🏻

Kudos!", "languageCode": "en"}, "authorAttribution": {"displayName": "AMV", "uri": "https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110071251657745750945/reviews", "photoUri": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-d8MtrVFoJj8o92JBWKISsfjtQgyurDKJlYN86WGxcFOqZbFHZg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4"}, "publishTime": "2024-12-29T09:14:46.546878Z", "flagContentUri": "https://www.google.com/local/review/rap/report?postId=ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUNmbm9paE5BEAE&d=17924085&t=1", "googleMapsUri": "https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m6!14m5!1m4!2m3!1sChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnSUNmbm9paE5BEAE!2m1!1s0x3bae1595eeff7fd1:0x39df1629df94c240"}, {"name": "places/ChIJ0X__7pUVrjsRQMKU3ykW3zk/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURBMnBPTHlnRRAB", "relativePublishTimeDescription": "2 months ago", "rating": 4, "text": {"text": "Weekends are for exploring new breakfast spots and this time, it was Bangalore Café, thanks to recommendations from some foodie friends.
We went on a Saturday morning and were initially discouraged by the sight of a packed crowd, even considering heading elsewhere. But places that draw such crowds usually do so for a reason, and true enough, the service was quick, and we hardly had to wait to order or receive our food.
My favorite was the idli vada, simple yet satisfying. As for the dosa, I’m still not quite used to the thick, ghee-laden style, so it wasn’t my favorite. One thing I did miss was sambar; here, it’s all about the chutneys.
The coffee was fantastic, though, and I’ll definitely be back to try more from their menu.", "languageCode": "en"}, "originalText": {"text": "Weekends are for exploring new breakfast spots and this time, it was Bangalore Café, thanks to recommendations from some foodie friends.
We went on a Saturday morning and were initially discouraged by the sight of a packed crowd, even considering heading elsewhere. But places that draw such crowds usually do so for a reason, and true enough, the service was quick, and we hardly had to wait to order or receive our food.
My favorite was the idli vada, simple yet satisfying. As for the dosa, I’m still not quite used to the thick, ghee-laden style, so it wasn’t my favorite. One thing I did miss was sambar; here, it’s all about the chutneys.
The coffee was fantastic, though, and I’ll definitely be back to try more from their menu.", "languageCode": "en"}, "authorAttribution": {"displayName": "Yogita Uchil", "uri": "https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106286953563575882478/reviews", "photoUri": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7z69pR4_LOzhPzmAKIhIYuJqg4PJseM8_JOlSViyIdFNjjFbZBw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7"}, "publishTime": "2025-02-08T09:53:27.783417Z", "flagContentUri": "https://www.google.com/local/review/rap/report?postId=ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURBMnBPTHlnRRAB&d=17924085&t=1", "googleMapsUri": "https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m6!14m5!1m4!2m3!1sChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTURBMnBPTHlnRRAB!2m1!1s0x3bae1595eeff7fd1:0x39df1629df94c240"}, {"name": "places/ChIJ0X__7pUVrjsRQMKU3ykW3zk/reviews/ChdDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUNncE8zZ3BBRRAB", "relativePublishTimeDescription": "a month ago", "rating": 5, "text": {"text": "Went for breakfast at 8 am on Friday 14th February 2025. There is no seating in this type of restaurant and we ordered our food and I had 2 isly one vada  masla dosa and a coffee .
You pay for the items and you get receipt with number on them . You get your idly and vada acroos the counter streaming hot and crispy vada . Idly melts in your mouth and vada despite the being hot it is so crunchy and tastes nice . The idly and vada flaits on the less spicy coconut nint chuney . You give your token no for your dosa and you get right size masla dosa . Masla not spicy and dosa crispy at edges soft in the centre . Viffe is strong and good falouve of thevfeshly brewed decoction
All around the food and the service levels are excellent
Only one issue the people serving food use bear hands may be if they use disposable goves for giving idly and vada it will be better", "languageCode": "en"}, "originalText": {"text": "Went for breakfast at 8 am on Friday 14th February 2025. You pay for the items and you get receipt with number on them . You get your idly and vada acroos the counter streaming hot and crispy vada . Idly melts in your mouth and vada despite the being hot it is so crunchy and tastes nice . The idly and vada flaits on the less spicy coconut nint chuney . I had ordered benne masala dose, khara bath and idli vada, all the items were immensely tasty. Definitely worth visiting, especially the khara bath was top notch and finished the breakfast with authentic filter coffee.
It'll be rush so it's better that you use the kiosk machine to order food.", "languageCode": "en"}, "originalText": {"text": "Great place to have breakfast. I had ordered benne masala dose, khara bath and idli vada, all the items were immensely tasty. It'll be rush so it's better that you use the kiosk machine to order food.", "languageCode": "en"}, "authorAttribution": {"displayName": "Sathwik Shenoy", "uri": "https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110854911264325273903/reviews", "photoUri": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_TApS_TzHTcZq9VF8o5tsV2BXbToMet4Y_MA-JbgzA30f_w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3"}, "publishTime": "2025-03-23T11:33:26.951650Z", "flagContentUri": "https://www.google.com/local/review/rap/report?postId=ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUR3LUtiT2JnEAE&d=17924085&t=1", "googleMapsUri": "https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m6!14m5!1m4!2m3!1sChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUR3LUtiT2JnEAE!2m1!1s0x3bae1595eeff7fd1:0x39df1629df94c240"}, {"name": "places/ChIJ0X__7pUVrjsRQMKU3ykW3zk/reviews/ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUN3dXVEaU9REAE", "relativePublishTimeDescription": "3 weeks ago", "rating": 4, "text": {"text": "I've visited this place a few times, and over time, the quality seems to be declining. I tried the Masale Dose, but it wasn't up to the mark—the amount of ghee and thickness felt off, and it was saltier than expected. The Idli and Vada are good, but the Chutney isn't as great as it used to be. However, the Kesaribath is worth trying, and the excellent coffee makes up for some of the shortcomings.

The seating space is limited, and there's not much room to relax, but the green and natural surroundings add to the charm. The place can get crowded, especially on weekends. If you're looking for a quick breakfast spot, it's still worth a visit.", "languageCode": "en"}, "originalText": {"text": "I've visited this place a few times, and over time, the quality seems to be declining. I tried the Masale Dose, but it wasn't up to the mark—the amount of ghee and thickness felt off, and it was saltier than expected. The Idli and Vada are good, but the Chutney isn't as great as it used to be. However, the Kesaribath is worth trying, and the excellent coffee makes up for some of the shortcomings.

The seating space is limited, and there's not much room to relax, but the green and natural surroundings add to the charm. The place can get crowded, especially on weekends. If you're looking for a quick breakfast spot, it's still worth a visit.", "languageCode": "en"}, "authorAttribution": {"displayName": "Adarsha BS", "uri": "https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114971939863166810709/reviews", "photoUri": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqrMnvS8CvOB8olubUDuGTOT6Y-0Rj84_Lt_2UaSAzoHD6-rG4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5"}, "publishTime": "2025-03-18T09:11:00.736393Z", "flagContentUri": "https://www.google.com/local/review/rap/report?postId=ChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUN3dXVEaU9REAE&d=17924085&t=1", "googleMapsUri": "https://www.google.com/maps/reviews/data=!4m6!14m5!1m4!2m3!1sChZDSUhNMG9nS0VJQ0FnTUN3dXVEaU9REAE!2m1!1s0x3bae1595eeff7fd1:0x39df1629df94c240"}]
